mapper.insert: insert into sys_user( user_id, login_id, enable, password, name, last_login_time, icon, introduce, tags, role_id, salt, create_time, update_time ) values( #{userId}, #{loginId}, #{enable}, #{password}, #{name}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{icon}, #{introduce}, #{tags}, #{roleId}, #{salt}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.select: select user_id as userId, login_id as loginId, enable as enable, password as password, name as name, last_login_time as lastLoginTime, icon as icon, introduce as introduce, tags as tags, role_id as roleId, salt as salt, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from sys_user where login_id = #{loginId} and enable = 'Y'
